item.description:
TOTS Itsy Bitsy Yoga Class Description (for crawlers to 23 months):
Itsy Bitsy Yoga for Tots is a supportive, fun-loving, and active yoga class. As totâ€™s mobility increases, classes offer tot-centric poses that encourage and support their physical explorations. Tots become more confident in their moving bodies as they practice yoga both in and out of class.
During a Tots Itsy Bitsy Yoga class crawlers and walkers playfully practice yoga postures while they are standing, sitting up, walking, and jumping. Parents also get to do a little yoga, but no yoga experience is required.
Thank you for arranging just 1 parent/caregiver per family.

Next Weekend Tots IBY Meetup Time: Saturday, April 11, 2:30-3:15pm

Cost: $15/class (pre-payment required w/ YES RSVP)

About Us:
All Weekend IBY Meetup classes are taught by Alexandra De Collibus, Certified Itsy Bitsy Yoga Facilitator and Director of Absolute Yoga in Hopkinton, MA. Alexandra has offered IBY classes under the name Sweet Pea Yoga since 2003 and has taught hundreds of pint-sized yogis across MA and RI.
Learn more at www.SweetPeaYoga.com
Itsy Bitsy Yoga was created by Helen Garabedian, an Infant Developmental Movement Educator, yoga teacher, and mother. Learn more at www.ItsyBitsyYoga.com
item.name: Weekend Tots Yoga Meetup (April)
